sentences.en: Because of its proximity , the bookstore became very well known to the three brothers.
sentences.cn: 因此书店与觉新弟兄的关系就更加密切了.

sentences.en: Families are no longer in close proximity to each other.
sentences.cn: 各家不再像以前一样比邻而居。

sentences.en: He became aware of the proximity of the Afghans.
sentences.cn: 他意识到阿富汗人近在咫尺。

sentences.en: Here the rich and the poor live in close proximity (= very near to each other ) .
sentences.cn: 在这里，富人和穷人比邻而居。

sentences.en: In other districts the proximity of cemeteries seemed to aggravate the disease.
sentences.cn: 在其它地区里,邻近墓地的地方,时疫大概都要严重些.

sentences.en: Items in proximity to one another are generally related.
sentences.cn: 位置上接近的元素通常也是有关系的,很多界面中采用粗边框矩形来分组.

sentences.en: Justice Scalia concluded that actual presence, not merely proximity, was required.
sentences.cn: 斯卡利亚法官得出结论,只有实际使用, 而不是靠近这些土地才能达到要求.

sentences.en: Marriages in proximity of blood are forbidden by the law.
sentences.cn: 法律规定禁止近亲结婚.

sentences.en: Proximity seeking is commonly interpreted as an index of infant - to - parent attachment.
sentences.cn: 对父母追寻亲近通常被解释为婴儿对双亲的附着依恋标志.

sentences.en: She at last condescended to evince awareness of his proximity.
sentences.cn: 最后她才纡贵屈尊地表示出她注意到他在旁边.

sentences.en: Some species may nest in close proximity to each other.
sentences.cn: 一些鸟类会彼此紧挨着筑巢。

sentences.en: That one splIt'second of proximity seems instead like an unbridgeable gap.
sentences.cn: 这一刹那的撙近,反见得暌隔的渺茫.

sentences.en: The chain must fold on itself to allow these cysteines to be in close proximity.
sentences.cn: 这个链必然是弯曲折叠,而使这些半胱氨酸靠得很近.

sentences.en: The monument was erected in the proximity of the town hall.
sentences.cn: 纪念碑矗立在市政厅旁.

sentences.en: Their house is in close proximity to ours.
sentences.cn: 他们的房子很接近我们的.

sentences.en: What drew him to the area was its proximity to central London.
sentences.cn: 吸引他到该地区的原因是那里靠近伦敦市中心。

words.tran_cn: 最接近的，邻近的；近身体中央的

phrases.tran_cn: 邻近效应，接近效应；近距离效果

trans.tran_cn: 接近，邻近，接近度，距离，亲近
